content:
# FACTORIO AGENT REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5) - currently working
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 3.0) - currently working with 17 coal remaining
- Steam engine at position(1.5, 7.5) - currently working
- Connected with pipe network between components
- Currently operational with water (11.7/min) and steam (11.7/min) flowing

### Iron Gear Wheel Production Line at Position(18.5, 73.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position(18.5, 73.5) mining iron ore - currently waiting for space in destination
- Stone furnace at position(19.0, 77.0) with coal fuel (50 coal remaining) - currently without ingredients
- Assembling machine 2 at position(24.5, 77.5) set to craft iron gear wheels - currently experiencing ingredient shortage
- Wooden chest at position(22.5, 77.5) for input storage
- Wooden chest at position(27.5, 77.5) for output storage (currently contains 205 iron gear wheels)
- Inserter at position(26.5, 77.5) to move finished gear wheels to chest - currently waiting for source items
- Small electric poles connecting all electrical components
- Currently partially operational but limited by iron plate supply

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position(34.5-38.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Two electric mining drills at positions(34.5, 70.5) and (38.5, 70.5) mining iron ore - currently waiting for space in destination
- Transport belts at positions(34.5, 72.5) and (38.5, 72.5) at drill outputs - currently blocked
- Underground belt system connecting the two mining drills (entry at 35.5, 72.5 and exit at 37.5, 72.5)
- Belt group from position(38.5, 72.5) to position(38.5, 75.5) for iron ore transport (currently contains 24 iron ore)
- Stone furnace at position(39.0, 77.0) with coal fuel (44 coal remaining) - currently working with 4 iron ore and 4 iron plates
- Inserter at position(40.5, 77.5) moving iron plates from furnace to belt - currently waiting for space in destination
- Transport belt line from position(41.5, 77.5) to position(49.5, 77.5) for iron plate transport (currently contains 35 iron plates)
- Small electric poles connecting all electrical components
- Currently partially operational but limited by blocked belts

### Manual Iron Smelting Station at Position(30.0, 77.0) and Position(33.0, 77.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(30.0, 77.0) with coal fuel (12 coal remaining) - currently working with 3 iron ore and 6 iron plates
- Stone furnace at position(33.0, 77.0) with coal fuel (4 coal remaining) - currently working with 3 iron ore and 6 iron plates
- Currently operational and actively producing iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces; use inserters as intermediaries
- When creating belt paths, ensure there's a valid path between start and end positions
- Check that belt placement positions are clear of obstacles
- When connecting distant belt segments, use underground belts or ensure a continuous path
- Clear blocked belts before attempting to place new ones at the same position

### Errors when placing entities
- Verify the target location is clear before placing entities
- Some areas may be unplaceable due to water or other terrain features
- Check for existing entities that might block placement
- When repositioning components, ensure you have a clear understanding of the required space
- Use the error message to identify exactly what's blocking placement

### Errors with inserter placement
- Ensure inserters are properly aligned with input/output positions
- Check that inserter pickup and drop positions match with the intended source and target entities
- Pay attention to inserter direction

### Errors with blocked production flow
- Regularly clear blocke
